alert.note: Alert for Cass; Harrison; Marion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:11AM CDT until June 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 111 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Linden to near Marshall, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Jefferson, Linden, Lodi, Woodlawn, Berea, Harleton, Kildare, Fairview, Avinger, Lassater, Nesbitt and Pruett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
